name: Above Lava
description:
Above Lava is a 2D Platformer.

Make your way to the Altar!
Don't forget to bring the Gem with you.
But beware... the floor is lava!

Gameplay

Every step you take turns the ground into lava.
You can shoot snowballs in the lava to freeze it.
Shooting mid-air pushes you in the opposite direction.

Controls

A Gamepad is strongly recommended.

  • Left Stick to move.
  • A to jump.
  • B to shoot.
